snippet: The Carnival Corporation said that it would repay the federal government an unspecified amount for responding to accidents on its Triumph and Splendor cruise ships, which left passengers stranded at sea.
abstract: Carnival Corporation says it will repay federal government unspecified amount for responding to accidents on its Triumph and Splendor cruise ships, which left thousands of passengers stranded at sea.
lead_paragraph: The Carnival Corporation said that it would repay the federal government an unspecified amount for responding to accidents on its Triumph and Splendor cruise ships, which left passengers stranded at sea.

headline.seo: Florida: Cruise Line Says It Will Pay for Rescue
headline.main: Florida: Cruise Line Says It Will Pay for Rescue
headline.print_headline: Florida: Cruise Line Says It Will Pay For Rescue
